title: Power Virtual Server DR Automation
introduction: Power Virtual Server DR Automation is a cloud solution to enable Disaster Recovery capability for your power virtual servers.

section_highlights.title: Planning and Building Disaster Recovery Solutions
section_highlights.description: This course introduces the concepts of disaster recovery and high availability and how they relate to IBM Cloud.

tiles.title: You can now deploy and manage your DR Automation resources in a private (client) cloud environment using IBM PowerVS Satellite locations. This update introduces the complete architecture, deployment flow, and configuration details for setting up DR Automation in client locations, including information about the Service Broker, KSYS orchestrator, storage tiers, and network connectivity.

You can now view the deployment timestamps for both the primary and standby orchestrators, along with the subscription plan details (Public or Private) selected during initial setup. These enhancements provide better tracking of deployment history and service configuration.

In Orchestrator UI Configuration deployment page, Modify VM option is provided which allows you to modify, configure multiple IP mappings, and enable the Shared Processor Pool (SPP) to optimize performance and resource utilization for the DR enabled virtual machines.

DR Automation now displays real-time notifications for events, that are deployment status, errors, and operational updates. Each notification appears as a pop-up with a timestamp, and you can track up to 100 current events, providing clear visibility into system activities and changes.

When deploying the orchestrator with Client Location (Private pod), the Add Sites page now displays Select Source Satellite Location and Select Target Satellite Location instead of region-based options.

DR Automation now support upgrading the orchestrator ksys filesets through a simplified CLI command, ensuring your system remains up to date with the latest features, fixes, and security enhancements.
You can now choose Orchestrator HA enablement in DR configuration page.
